member.name: M:GoCoSupermarket.BusinessLogic.StockParserBusinessLogic.CategoriseStockKeepingUnits(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{GoCoSupermarket.DTO.StockKeepingUnit},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Char})
member.summary: Takes a set of SKUs and organises them into a dictionary, where the key is the item code, and the value is the set of items with that offer code.
member.param: A set of item codes representing the items purchased.
